King on Screen is a 2022 French-Belgian  documentary film directed by Daphné Baiwir. It analyzes the film and television adaptations of Stephen King's works through interviews to directors, screenwriters and actors involved in those projects.
Interviewees
* Peter Askin
* Dan Attias
* Craig R. Baxley
* Josh Boone
* James Caan
* David Carson
* Frank Darabont
* Jeffrey DeMunn
* Mike Flanagan
* Mick Garris
* Taylor Hackford
* Scott Hicks
* Amy Irving
* Fraser C. Heston
* Mikael Håfström
* John Harrison
* Zak Hilditch
* Tom Holland
* Mark L. Lester
* Tom McLoughlin
* Vincenzo Natali
* André Øvredal
* Mikael Salomon
* Lewis Teague
* Tod Williams
Release
The film premiered at Fantastic Fest on 24 September 2022.
